content:
HttpTransportElement Class

Definition

Represents the configuration element that specifies an HTTP transport for transmitting SOAP messages.

In this Article

public class HttpTransportElement : System.ServiceModel.Configuration.TransportElement
Inheritance
Object
ConfigurationElement
ServiceModelConfigurationElement
ServiceModelExtensionElement
BindingElementExtensionElement
System.ServiceModel.Configuration.TransportElement
HttpTransportElement

Constructors

HttpTransportElement()

Initializes a new instance of the HttpTransportElement class.

public HttpTransportElement ();

Properties

AllowCookies

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the client accepts cookies and propagates them on future requests.

public bool AllowCookies { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if cookies are allowed; otherwise, false. The default is false.

Remarks

You can use this property when you interact with ASMX Web services that use cookies. In this way, you can be sure that the cookies returned from the server are automatically copied to all future client requests for that service.

AuthenticationScheme

Gets or sets the authentication scheme used to authenticate client requests being processed by an HTTP listener.

public System.Net.AuthenticationSchemes AuthenticationScheme { get; set; }
Value
AuthenticationSchemes

The AuthenticationSchemes object that specifies the protocols used for client authentication. The default is Anonymous.

Remarks

The authentication scheme can only be set once.

BindingElementType

Gets the type of binding.

public override Type BindingElementType { get; }
Value
Type

The type of binding.

BypassProxyOnLocal

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether proxies are ignored for local addresses.

public bool BypassProxyOnLocal { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if proxies are ignored for local addresses; otherwise, false. The default is false.

Remarks

A local address is one that is on the local LAN or intranet. Always ignores the proxy if the service address begins with http://localhost. You should use the host name rather than localhost if you want clients to go through a proxy when communicating with services on the same machine.

DecompressionEnabled

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether data decompression for SOAP messages is enabled for this transport.

public bool DecompressionEnabled { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if data decompression for SOAP messages is enabled for this transport; otherwise, false.

ExtendedProtectionPolicy

Gets a ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement instance which contains the configuration settings to use for extended protection for a session.

public System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement ExtendedProtectionPolicy { get; }
Value
ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement

The ExtendedProtectionPolicyElement which contains the configuration settings to use for extended protection for a session.

HostNameComparisonMode

Gets or sets a value that specifies how the hostname is used to reach the service when matching on the URI.

public System.ServiceModel.HostNameComparisonMode HostNameComparisonMode { get; set; }
Value
HostNameComparisonMode

The HostNameComparisonMode value that specifies how the hostname is included when routing incoming requests to an endpoint URI. The default value is StrongWildcard, which ignores the hostname in the match.

KeepAliveEnabled

Gets or sets a Boolean value that indicates whether to make a persistent connection to the internet resource.

public bool KeepAliveEnabled { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if a persistent connection to the internet resource is maintained; otherwise, false.

MaxBufferSize

Gets or sets the maximum size of the buffer pool.

public int MaxBufferSize { get; set; }
Value
Int32

The maximum size of the buffer pool. The default is 524,288 bytes (512 * 1024).

MaxPendingAccepts

Gets or sets the maximum number of pending asynchronous accept operations that are available for processing incoming connections to the service.

public int MaxPendingAccepts { get; set; }
Value
Int32

The maximum number of pending asynchronous accept operations that are available for processing incoming connections to the service.

MessageHandlerFactory

Gets or sets the message handler factory.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.HttpMessageHandlerFactoryElement MessageHandlerFactory { get; set; }
Value
HttpMessageHandlerFactoryElement

The message handler factory.

Properties

Gets a ConfigurationPropertyCollection instance that contains a collection of ConfigurationProperty objects that can be attributes or ConfigurationElement objects of this configuration element.

protected override System.Configuration.ConfigurationPropertyCollection Properties { get; }
Value
ConfigurationPropertyCollection

A ConfigurationPropertyCollection instance that contains a collection of ConfigurationProperty objects that can be attributes or ConfigurationElement objects of this configuration element.

ProxyAddress

Gets or sets a URI that contains the address of the proxy to use for HTTP requests.

public Uri ProxyAddress { get; set; }
Value
Uri

The Uri that contains the address for the proxy.

ProxyAuthenticationScheme

Gets or sets the authentication scheme used to authenticate client requests being processed by an HTTP proxy.

public System.Net.AuthenticationSchemes ProxyAuthenticationScheme { get; set; }
Value
AuthenticationSchemes

The AuthenticationSchemes object that specifies the protocols used for client authentication on the proxy. The default is Anonymous.

Realm

Gets or sets the authentication realm.

public string Realm { get; set; }
Value
String

A string that contains the authentication realm.

RequestInitializationTimeout

Gets or sets the timespan that specifies how long the request initialization has to complete before timing out.

public TimeSpan RequestInitializationTimeout { get; set; }
Value
TimeSpan

A timespan after which the request initialization times out.

TransferMode

Gets or sets a value that specifies whether messages are buffered or streamed or a request or response.

public System.ServiceModel.TransferMode TransferMode { get; set; }
Value
TransferMode

A valid TransferMode value that specifies whether messages are buffered or streamed or a request or response.

UnsafeConnectionNtlmAuthentication

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unsafe connection sharing is enabled on the server.

public bool UnsafeConnectionNtlmAuthentication { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if unsafe connection sharing is enabled; otherwise, false. The default is false.

Remarks

If enabled, NTLM authentication is performed once on each TCP connection.

UseDefaultWebProxy

Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the machine-wide proxy settings are used rather than the user-specific settings.

public bool UseDefaultWebProxy { get; set; }
Value
Boolean

true if the System.Net default proxy settings are used; otherwise, false. The default is true.

WebSocketSettings

Gets or sets the web socket settings.

public System.ServiceModel.Configuration.WebSocketTransportSettingsElement WebSocketSettings { get; set; }
Value
WebSocketTransportSettingsElement

The web socket settings.

Methods

ApplyConfiguration(BindingElement)

Applies a new configuration for this element.

public override void ApplyConfiguration (System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement bindingElement);
bindingElement
BindingElement

The binding element to use for this configuration.

CopyFrom(ServiceModelExtensionElement)

Copies the configuration element from a specified source.

public override void CopyFrom (System.ServiceModel.Configuration.ServiceModelExtensionElement from);
from
ServiceModelExtensionElement

The source that contains the element to be copied.

CreateDefaultBindingElement()

Creates a new transport binding element from this instance.

protected override System.ServiceModel.Channels.TransportBindingElement CreateDefaultBindingElement ();
Returns
TransportBindingElement

The newly created TransportBindingElement object.

InitializeFrom(BindingElement)

Initializes this instance using a specified binding element.

protected override void InitializeFrom (System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement bindingElement);
bindingElement
BindingElement

The binding element to use for initialization.
